title: Natural Expressions
description: Capture genuine emotions and behaviour by photographing children at their own eye level.

title: Favourite Toy
description: When photographing children, remember to shoot from their eye level! Concerning poses, though, let them be 'as they are' and try to capture their natural expressions, emotions and behavior.

title: Resting Pose
description: A relaxed shot of the child laying on one arm, either straight or bent.

title: Everyday Moments
description: Photograph them doing familiar activities like painting, reading, or playing.

title: Unaware Candid
description: Set up so the child is focused on their own activity and unaware of the camera.

title: Story Time
description: Include a parent reading together with the child to create a warm and engaging scene.

title: Joyful Reactions
description: Look out for moments of laughter or shouting for emotional, memorable shots.

title: Funny Faces
description: Ask them to show a funny face — kids often go all out!

title: Leaning Portrait
description: Simple portrait with arms resting on an object — suitable for sitting or standing.

title: Top-Down Angle
description: Try shooting from above for an interesting and playful viewpoint.
